work.name: Lambda Capital
highlights: Built data pipelines to identify special situations investment opportunities, utilizing transformer-based natural language processing models and advanced statistical analysis on alternative data.

work.name: Wealthstone Group
highlights: Designed client-facing real investment pitch decks and proposals for high-net-worth investors.
Implemented Monte Carlo simulations in Python to model portfolio return distributions and stress-test risk factor assumptions, improving precision of downside risk estimates.
Built a performance attribution framework to evaluate whether private real estate investments generated persistent risk-adjusted alpha relative to public REIT benchmarks.

work.name: Purdue University
highlights: Building a multimodal artificial intelligence system (computer vision, FFT audio analysis) for converting guitar performance video into sheet music, advised by Dr. Yung-Hsiang Lu and Dr. Kristen Yeon-Ji Yun.

work.name: Purdue University
highlights: Held office hours twice a week to tutor students for ECE 20001: Electrical Engineering Fundamentals.
Taught phasors and complex impedance, fundamental transistor operation, transformer principles, and more.

work.name: HP Ventures
work.position: Deal Sourcing and Startup Analysis Extern

highlights: Designed and led project for cross-exchange and triangular arbitrage algorithm for large-cap coins.
Developed and backtested several trading and portfolio optimization strategies.

projects.name: Trading and Portfolio Management Whitepaper
highlights: Published a paper on Markov models and the markets in the Quant Methods and Global Investments journal.
Backtested various Markov model trading strategies on industrial and precious metals futures.

projects.name: US Bond Yield Time Series Forecasting
highlights: Forecasted 10-year bond yield rates to an accuracy of 0.06 basis points using machine learning algorithms.
